title: Ohio Justices Toss GOP Statehouse Maps, Order Fix In 10 Days

sentence: Also dissenting was Justice Patrick DeWine, son of governor and commission member Mike DeWine.
author: Susan Tebben
title: Ohio Supreme Court rejects GOP-drawn Statehouse district maps for the third time
